title: shrIpatim
sahitya:
(rAgA:  madhymAvati)   


anupallavi



shrIpatim.  rAgamAlikA.  Adi tALA.
1:  shrIpatim brahma rudrAdi vanditam guNapUritam vicitra rUpa caritam nArasimha bhajE anisham
 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  mAyAmALavgauLa)  hiraNyakashipuhu pUrvam pitAmaha varOddhataha matsamO nAsti sarvatrEtyaham bhAva samanvitaha
 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  nIlAmbari)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 P M1 G3 R2 G3 S  AtmAnam Ishvaram matvA harim vismrtya durmatihi svabhAvOcita duSkArya pravartanaparO abhavat
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  kAmbhOji)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S N3 P D2 S  athaikadA sutam draSTum preSayAmAsa sEvakAn Agatam sutamAlingya babhASE hrSTamAnasaha
 caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  bOdhitam gurubihi kim kim kim tvayA viditam drDham tat-tattvam brUhi mA bhaiSIhi shrOtumicchAmi bAlaka
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  kalyANi)Aa:S R2 G3 M2 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M2 G3 R2 S  ityuktavantam pitaram natvA svAntasthitam harim dhyAtvA shrI vAsudEvam tam nijAshayama bhASata
 caraNam 7  			(rAgA:aThANA)Aa:S R2 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 P G3 R2 S  harirEva parOdEvaha harihi sarvatra sarvagaha itIrayantam prahlAdam bahudhA pIDayanmuhuhu
 caraNam 8  			(rAgA:  Arabhi)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  asticAtsa haristambhE darshayAdyaiva mE ripum na darshayasi cEtsatyam tvAm haniSyAmi durmtE
 caraNam 9  			(rAgA:  pUrNacandrikA)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 P S  Av:  S N3 P M1 R2 G3 M1 R2 S  iti bruvANam daityEndram hantumudyamya satvaram kruddha stambha samudbhUtO bhagavAn bhaktavatsalaha
 caraNam 10  			(rAgA:  bEgaDa)Aa:S G3 R2 G3 M1 P D2 N2 D2 P S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  hatvA hiraNyakashipum yOrarakSa jagatrayam tam prahlAdanutam dEvam nArasimham bhajE anisham
 caraNam 11  			(rAgA:  bhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  gIyamAnam nAradAdyair-maharSibhir-aharnisham rugAdi vEdavEdyam tam nArasimham bhajE anisham
1 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  kEdAragauLa)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  rNadAridrya rOgA divArakam bhava tArakam dInabandhum dayAsindhum nArasimham bhajE anisham
1 caraNam 3  			( rAgA:  vasantA)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 M1 G3 R1 S  nArasimha stOtramidam bhuktimukti pradAyakam racitam vAsudEvEna gIta sAhitya dhImatA
